testimonials.name: John Li Wei
testimonials.testimonial_note: UponRock connected me with an amazing mentor who guided me through my career journey in environmental engineering. I had so many doubts about my next steps, but my mentor's insights gave me the confidence I needed. The platform is easy to use, and the connection was smooth and supportive.

testimonials.name: Emily Harris
testimonials.testimonial_note: Thanks to UponRock, I found a mentor who helped me navigate my post-graduation job search in the wildlife conservation field. I felt reassured knowing I had someone experienced to guide me, and it made the transition into my career much easier.

testimonials.name: Julie Bennett
testimonials.testimonial_note: As a student entering the outdoor sports industry, UponRock was invaluable in finding someone to give me practical advice on building my career. The mentor I connected with gave me a clearer path and even helped me grow my network in ways I never expected.
